lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen, this concludes the performance of the Rawlings coming to you over station KFVD. A single note of the chime, ladies and gentlemen, will indicate the correct time coming to you courtesy of the Gullible Watch Company.
Oh, but I don't feel comfortable.
Say, what is coming off around here?
Well, that's what I'd like to know! She's been chasing me all over the house trying to take things off of me!
Oh, Zasu, don't be silly. She's your French maid! She's here to help you get undressed.
Well, doesn't one have any privacy around here!
Oh, hurry up and get those things off. You're going to be late for tea.
Well, I always took my own clothes off in Joplin. I don't need any help around here.

You was going to Long Beach, in my car, to spend a nice quiet evening and I was to meet you in the morning to have a swim and I find you in a joint like this with every guy around here hanging on to you!
Oh, Miss Todd, would you care to see the Japanese pagoda?
